entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 6:39 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:39 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
